mDistanceConsideredClose.description: Distance used when calculating if a location is near a base

mNumFactoriesNeededForCloseCheck.description: How many factories need to be within the close range for it to count as if a given location is near a base

BuildableConstructedGlobalDelegate.description: Broadcast when a buildable or decor has been constructed. Regardless of who built it

mBuildableInstancesActor.description: Hierarchical instances for the factory buildings.

mFactoryColoredMaterialMap.description: This is also used for non-colored materials, for example, the conveyor belt materials so that the same instance can be applied to many different belts

mUseFixedFactoryTick.description: Begin Fixed Factory Tick Config Parameters

mMaxTickSubsteps.description: An unknown type (likely an Unreal Engine or plugin type).

mDistanceBasedTickRate.description: Information about what distances we change the tick rate on

mFactoryOptimizationEnabled.description: Is factory optimization ( tick control ) active

mReplayEffecTimeDilation.description: How much time can differ between each build effect

mReplayEffectTimerDefault.description: How much time between each build effect when replaying the whole factory

mDefaultFactoryMaterial.description: used for comparing and finding materials of factory meshes

mFactoryTickFunction.description: Controls if we should receive Factory_Tick and how frequent.
